pullrequest.title: Initial SRC cloudsim gazebo docker container

content.raw: I think these lines only work if the script is called from a shell in the docker folder. Adding `DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"` and changing these lines to something like `docker build ${DOCKER_ARGS} -t gazebo-cloudsim:latest $DIR/gazebo-cloudsim` would allow the script to be called from a terminal in any folder.
content.html: I think these lines only work if the script is called from a shell in the docker folder. Adding DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )" and changing these lines to something like docker build ${DOCKER_ARGS} -t gazebo-cloudsim:latest $DIR/gazebo-cloudsim would allow the script to be called from a terminal in any folder.
